Knee strengthening training.name: Wall Sits
Knee strengthening training.description: Sit against a wall at a 90-degree angle, holding for time.

Knee strengthening training.name: Step-Ups
Knee strengthening training.description: Step onto an elevated surface and back down repeatedly.

Knee strengthening training.name: Single-Leg Balance
Knee strengthening training.description: Stand on one leg to improve knee stability.

Knee strengthening training.name: Pistol Squats
Knee strengthening training.description: Squat down on one leg while keeping the other extended.

Knee strengthening training.name: Partial Squats
Knee strengthening training.description: Perform a squat but stop halfway before returning to a standing position.

Knee strengthening training.name: Straight Leg Raises
Knee strengthening training.description: Lie on your back and lift one leg straight up, holding for time.

Knee strengthening training.name: Lunges
Knee strengthening training.description: Step forward and lower your back knee towards the ground in a controlled motion.

Knee strengthening training.name: Reverse Lunges
Knee strengthening training.description: Step backward into a lunge position to strengthen knee stability.

Knee strengthening training.name: Glute Bridge
Knee strengthening training.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, lifting your hips to engage the posterior chain.

Knee strengthening training.name: Calf Raises
Knee strengthening training.description: Rise onto your toes and slowly lower to strengthen lower leg muscles supporting the knee.

Knee strengthening training.name: Heel Walks
Knee strengthening training.description: Walk on your heels with toes lifted to activate stabilizing muscles.

Knee strengthening training.name: Toe Walks
Knee strengthening training.description: Walk on your toes to strengthen lower leg and knee stabilizers.

Knee strengthening training.name: Seated Leg Extensions
Knee strengthening training.description: Sit and extend your leg straight out, holding briefly before lowering.

Knee strengthening training.name: Terminal Knee Extensions
Knee strengthening training.description: Stand and slightly bend your knee, then extend it fully, engaging the quads.

Knee strengthening training.name: Step-Through Lunges
Knee strengthening training.description: Step forward into a lunge, then step backward into a reverse lunge without pausing.

Knee strengthening training.name: Cossack Squat
Knee strengthening training.description: Shift your weight side to side into a deep lateral squat to improve knee mobility.

Knee strengthening training.name: Shrimp Squats
Knee strengthening training.description: Hold one foot behind you while lowering into a controlled single-leg squat.

Knee strengthening training.name: Standing Quad Stretch
Knee strengthening training.description: Stand on one leg and pull the other foot towards your glutes to stretch the quadriceps.

Knee strengthening training.name: Hamstring Curls (No Equipment)
Knee strengthening training.description: Lie on your stomach and slowly curl your leg up, engaging the hamstrings.

Knee strengthening training.name: Deep Squat Hold
Knee strengthening training.description: Hold a deep squat position while maintaining balance and proper posture.

Knee strengthening training.name: Leg Swings
Knee strengthening training.description: Swing one leg forward and backward to loosen up the hip flexors.

Knee strengthening training.name: Butt Kicks
Knee strengthening training.description: Run in place while kicking your heels toward your glutes.

Knee strengthening training.name: High Knees
Knee strengthening training.description: Run in place while bringing your knees up to waist level.

Knee strengthening training.name: Lateral Leg Swings
Knee strengthening training.description: Swing one leg side to side to loosen up the hip joints.

Knee strengthening training.name: Ankle Circles
Knee strengthening training.description: Rotate your ankle in circles to increase mobility and activate stabilizers.
